name: Private Full-Day Twante Tour from Yangon
description: Experience a slice of daily life in Myanmar during this private 7-hour excursion to the village of Twante outside Yangon. You’ll spend the day learning about rural Burmese culture, visiting a local pottery workshop, and visiting Shwesandaw Pagoda, plus much more. Lunch, entrance fees, local guide, and boat transport to the village are all covered.
